seb_mckinnon.name: Seb McKinnon
seb_mckinnon.style_description: Moody, gothic, painterly surrealism with ethereal atmosphere and dark fantasy themes

rebecca_guay.name: Rebecca Guay
rebecca_guay.style_description: Delicate watercolor and ink work with storybook and pre-Raphaelite aesthetics

terese_nielsen.name: Terese Nielsen
terese_nielsen.style_description: Saturated colors, iconic compositions with high-contrast fantasy lighting

john_avon.name: John Avon
john_avon.style_description: Luminous landscapes with atmospheric depth - you can smell the air

nils_hamm.name: Nils Hamm
nils_hamm.style_description: Eerie, atmospheric realism with strong mood design and unsettling undertones

rk_post.name: rk post
rk_post.style_description: Dark fantasy with sharp silhouettes and metal-album energy

kev_walker.name: Kev Walker
kev_walker.style_description: Gritty, dynamic figures with bold brushwork - classic modern Magic look

ron_spencer.name: Ron Spencer
ron_spencer.style_description: Grotesque horror creature work with extremely identifiable organic textures

mark_tedin.name: Mark Tedin
mark_tedin.style_description: Old-school surreal alien fantasy with early-Magic signature feel and cosmic weirdness

quinton_hoover.name: Quinton Hoover
quinton_hoover.style_description: Loose, expressive brushwork with dreamy character pieces and soft edges

zoltan_boros.name: Zoltan Boros
zoltan_boros.style_description: Dramatic realism with big cinematic scenes and dynamic lighting

steve_argyle.name: Steve Argyle
steve_argyle.style_description: Polished character portraits with crisp fantasy illustration and vibrant colors

wayne_reynolds.name: Wayne Reynolds
wayne_reynolds.style_description: Dense linework with kinetic busy compositions and explosive action

aleksi_briclot.name: Aleksi Briclot
aleksi_briclot.style_description: Sleek, cinematic concept-art style with dramatic poses and rich atmosphere

magali_villeneuve.name: Magali Villeneuve
magali_villeneuve.style_description: Ultra-detailed elegant high-fantasy realism with exquisite character rendering

drew_tucker.name: Drew Tucker
drew_tucker.style_description: Abstract experimental texture-heavy fantasy with unconventional compositions

dan_frazier.name: Dan Frazier
dan_frazier.style_description: Clean iconic artifact and iconography look with graphic design sensibility

chippy.name: Chippy
chippy.style_description: Stylized bold shapes with slightly cartoon satirical edge and strong silhouettes
